CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Hydropower?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Hydropower is arc {Oil}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Wind?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Wind is arc {Geothermal}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Geothermal to Wind in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Hydropower to Wind in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Geothermal and Oil in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Geothermal and Oil is {219}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Hydropower and Oil in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Hydropower and Oil is {40}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Geothermal?
SC.A: The total flow output from Geothermal is {482}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Hydropower?
SC.A: The total flow input by Hydropower is {580}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 290? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {296} from {Wind} to {Hydropower}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 82? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {40} from {Hydropower} to {Oil}, a flow of {81} from {Oil} to {Hydropower}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 139 and 211? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {203} from {Geothermal} to {Hydropower}, a flow of {141} from {Geothermal} to {Wind}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Geothermal to Oil or from Wind to Hydropower?
NC.A: The flow from {Wind} to {Hydropower} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Hydropower to Oil, from Hydropower to Wind, or from Geothermal to Oil?
NC.A: The flow from {Hydropower} to {Wind} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Oil}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Hydropower} and {Wind}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Geothermal, Arc Hydropower, Arc Wind, Arc Oil}.
